post_text:
Attention Tiger Parents!!!
The PTSA needs your help!!!
Our Tiger Challenge event on Friday was a HUGE success and the students, staff and volunteers had so much fun. It was so great to see the students taking part in some friendly fitness based competition and team building. So many smiles and fun memories. 
BUT.....the fundraising efforts fell short and we are below last years numbers. These funds help support field trips, activities and improvements to PMS.
We are hopeful that there are still some forms out there that havent made it in or some students who still may be working on fundraising. Below you will find a link to the sponsor form in case you need another.
https://www.pelhamsd.org/pms-news/219-tiger-challenge-fundraising-event

Please send in those forms and support our Tigers at Pelham Memorial!! We need your help!!

post_text: Come Tonight and Get Informed!!!
shared_text:
PELHAMACES.ORG
Deliberative Session- Wednesday February 6!

Pelham Proud for Education
February 4, 2019 at 11:29 AM 路

At deliberative session, you will have the opportunity to learn more about School Warrant Article #2, the Teacher's Collective Bargaining Agreement (CBA).

Deliberative session attendance is very important. This is an open forum in which registered voters can change, add to, or amend warrant articles.

Please come learn about the importance of the CBA to make an informed decision when you vote on March 12th.

ALSO: We will have available a limited number of complimentary #PelhamProudForEducation t-shirts. These will be available prior to the deliberative session. Show your support by grabbing a tee!

post_text:
Due to hazardous road conditions near the pie warehouse, the 8th grade pies will not be delivered to PMS this afternoon. The pies will now be delivered to PMS on Monday, November 19th for pick up from 4-6pm. We are terribly sorry for any inconvenience this delay may cause, and we truly appreciate your understanding.
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact the PTSA at
pelhamptsa@pelhamsd.org

Stay safe and warm in this unexpected November snow! 锔

Please join us tomorrow, Wednesday, October 3rd at 6pm for our first PTSA meeting of the year in the cafe at PMS

Looking forward to sharing lots of new ideas and planning some fun activities for our students.

Remember this is PTSA and student members are welcome and encouraged!!

post_text:
Tiger Challenge has kicked off and all students should have brought home their information and fundraising packets.
We have 12 more days until the event on Friday, October 12th!!
Please help your students raise funds and prepare for some good old fashion competition amongst their classmates.

All funds MUST be returned before the 12th to be eligible for the prizes!!

If you need additional forms or information please feel free to email the PTSA at pelhamptsa@pelhamsd.org

Thank you for your support and we are looking forward to a wonderful event!!

post_text:
On Tuesday, February 20th at 6pm the PMS Band will be hosting their annual Bingo Night! Flyers will be going home this week to sign up to attend this event. We are looking for prizes to share for this event. We are hopeful that some area business or families may be willing to donate gift cards or items to be awarded to our Bingo winners. If you or someone you know wants to donate a prize please email the PTSA at pelhamptsa@pelhamsd.org or Mrs. Saunders at esaunders@pelhamsd.org
Thank you for your support!!

post_text:
This morning the 8th grade kicked off their Pie Fundraiser for their DC trip. The students and staff were great sports as they took part in the pie eating contest. The students will be coming home today with their sale packets. The fundraiser will run until November 3rd.
Best of luck with your sale 8th graders!!

post_text:
PTSA wants YOU!!!
Please join our efforts to help make Pelham Memorial the best it can be.
Please click the link below to print your membership form. Fill it out and send it in with your student addressed to the PTSA.
The PTSA sponsors events at PMS and we are always looking for volunteers to help with our efforts.
Thank you for your support!!
